description.originalText:
I would like to share my wonderful experience with our babysitter! She has been an absolute gem in our lives. From the moment she started watching my 2-year-old daughter, it was clear that she has a natural gift for caring for children. Her loving and nurturing demeanor puts my daughter at ease, and I can see how much joy she brings to their time together.

Not only has she been fantastic with my little one, but she has also stepped in to watch my 9-year-old son when needed. She engages him with fun activities and ensures that he feels just as special and cared for. Her ability to connect with both of my children is truly impressive.

Reliability is one of her standout qualities; she is always on time and ready to go, which gives me peace of mind. I can't express how important it is to have someone you can trust completely. Her caring nature and attention to detail make her an invaluable part of our family routine.

I wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone looking for a babysitter. She has not only met our expectations but has exceeded them in every way. We feel so lucky to have found such a fantastic caregiver!

Liz is the best!  She has a warm and funny personality and builds rapport quickly with kids.  She is also incredibly responsive and reliable.  She drives- and keeps car seats in her car- which is huge when it comes to getting kids to playdates or appointments.  She plans great activities, like crafts and playground visits, to keep kids busy and engaged.  She is also SO FLEXIBLE, and adjusts when plans change or a last minute request comes up.  She feels like a part of my family and my kids are always so excited when she comes to care for them!

description.displayText: I hired Liz to be our nanny and a week before she was supposed to start she completely  cut off communication from us. I paid for the background check and gave her an offer which she accepted. We tried calling and texting to confirm her start time and asked her to provide us with a valid driver's license  (since she said she can drive). She never responded. I do not recommend working with Liz. She is not reliable and honest.
description.originalText: I hired Liz to be our nanny and a week before she was supposed to start she completely  cut off communication from us. I paid for the background check and gave her an offer which she accepted. We tried calling and texting to confirm her start time and asked her to provide us with a valid driver's license  (since she said she can drive). She never responded. I do not recommend working with Liz. She is not reliable and honest.

description.displayText:
Liz took care of our youngest son for 10 months, starting when he was 12mo old. She is very easy going, dependable and trustworthy. She also picked up our 5yr and 7yr old from school and camp and always made it fun for kids driving back. She took the younger kid to library toddler classes, which he loves and learned so much from. 

She plays with the kids and even goes in the pool with the kids when they want to go ion. They all learned more swimming skills from her than the last couple of years of private lessons. 

It's time for our youngest to go to daycare so we will not need Liz's help anymore, but we will definitely miss her!

description.displayText: I hired Liz with great expectations. She was great playing with the kids but will not follow directions.  Needed constant redirection. Called out sick 3 times in less than 1 &1/2 months. No sense of accountability for my things at home..and gave me a weeks notice prior to leaving out of which 1 day she took off.. this is not something I expected. Anyways happy I am done.
description.originalText: I hired Liz with great expectations. She was great playing with the kids but will not follow directions.  Needed constant redirection. Called out sick 3 times in less than 1 &1/2 months. No sense of accountability for my things at home..and gave me a weeks notice prior to leaving out of which 1 day she took off.. this is not something I expected. Anyways happy I am done.

description.displayText:
From the first time we spoke on the phone,  Liz immediately set my mind at ease. It is never easy leaving your child with someone new, especially for the first time. After hiring Liz, however, I felt comforted knowing my daughter was in good hands. Liz listened to and respected our instructions without problems or hesitation. She never complained or became frustrated in challenging moments. Instead she handled them warmly and with grace. She frequently updated me throughout the day, kept a log of the day's events and even sent videos and pictures to help brighten my own day away from my daughter. 
Liz was abundantly patient and flexible with our last-minute scheduling conflicts. She offered to help us out of sticky situations on more than one occasion by staying late or coming in on extra days that we needed her. She was always punctual, reliable, and kind. We highly recommend Liz.

description.displayText:
Liz cared for my daughter (9yrs). Helped my daughter with homework and play Wii/board games.
Her grades got better and got more piece of mind 
if there is any one who cares for my daughter besides my close family, its Liz
Big thanks !!!

description.displayText:
We chanced upon Liz when our little one was a few months old. Overtime, she has become a part of our family and a true friend. Not only she has left an undeniable impression on our little one but also with us. She is a person with a big heart, always willing to go the extra mile and most importantly with a big SMILE. 

We highly recommend Liz!

description.displayText: Liz is very attentive and kind to not only my daughter but our dog as well. Would recommend her to anyone looking for child care or pet care.
description.originalText: Liz is very attentive and kind to not only my daughter but our dog as well. Would recommend her to anyone looking for child care or pet care.

description.displayText: Liz is a kind, caring and responsible care giver. She is attentive to the children in her care and provides multiple opportunities for the children to grow.
description.originalText: Liz is a kind, caring and responsible care giver. She is attentive to the children in her care and provides multiple opportunities for the children to grow.
